item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Fire

~The drinks specials for the NHC are their Friday drink specials: $3 draft beers, $5 martinis and mixed drinks (Absolute, not Grey Goose)
~Free foods for the NHC include bruschetta, fries, and pizza, and they are offering 1/2 prize on other appetizers for us.

Thank you Vicki at Fire!

Contact is Karen, 203-535-8751.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***

Post-party location TBD.
item.name: Happy Hour - FIRE
